dict.string: You can choose a background image from the available images or from your photo library. You can even use the camera to take a photo for the background!

### What a beautiful scene!
If you choose an image that has some transparent or see-through parts, the background color shows through the transparent parts of the image. If there is no background color, you’ll see a checkerboard pattern. You can set the background color like this:
`scene.backgroundColor = ◼️`
